fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot someone at night, dealing a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Since you are a bird and can fly, your visits are astral and you cannot be roleblocked.
- If you shoot a town member, you lose your ability, even if they live.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, there is no penalty for killing Town members.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town
